Access intranet off campus¶

If you’re off campus and need to get to info.tsinghua (e.g. to view your grades). Enter http://info.tsinghua.edu.cn/ into your browser’s address bar and follow the steps below.

1. Click WEB方式登录入口¶

2. Sign in¶

Enter your Student ID into the top text entry field followed, by your password in the field below it.

When you’re all set, click the 登录 button in the lower left corner.

3. Choose your destination¶

From here, you can choose which version of info.tsinghua (i.e. desktop or mobile) you’d like to go to.
